the bor knit to bor note if you need a longer heel flap you need to calculate how to start the pattern on the sole by starting to count from the first sole marker back to the start of the gusset/sole knowing that the st before the first marker matches the last instep st gusset decreases the first and the last sts of the gusset-sole are the braid sts and they are always worked with mc and slipped with cc if a slipped st is next to the braid don t slip it but knit it the sole chart starts with row 2 in cc be careful to keep the sole sts in their correct pattern round 1 cc k instep sts sl1 k1 2
